body:
Hello

We are interested in what prizes you guys would like to see for tournament 3. Would you be interested in credits? Ranks? Donator perks? Let the officials know by posting below, all suggestions will be taken into consideration.

Regards

The Officials
body_tagged:
Hello

We are interested in what prizes you guys would like to see for tournament 3. Would you be interested in credits? Ranks? Donator perks? Let the officials know by posting below, all suggestions will be taken into consideration.

Regards

The Officials
title: Tournament 3 - Prizes

replies.body:
I'm not sure what the official term for these are, but it would be neat to have a tournament winner flair/badge. (the thing after your name). This would show that they won the tournament while playing ingame.

Plus it would be one of the cool exclusive things you get for winning that no one else can get. Expect more winners of course
replies.body_tagged:
I'm not sure what the official term for these are, but it would be neat to have a tournament winner flair/badge. (the thing after your name). This would show that they won the tournament while playing ingame.

Plus it would be one of the cool exclusive things you get for winning that no one else can get. Expect more winners of course

replies.body:
1st place: Diamond rank for the leaders and emerald rank to the other members & a tag in their profiles that says "Tournaments Winner"

2nd place: Emerald rank to the leaders and gold to the members, 5K credits & a tag that says "2nd Place"

3rd place: Gold rank to everyone & a tag that says "3rd Place"

EDIT: I like the Crazy's idea that they have a exclusive badge

Similar to everyone's:

1st place:
 - Forum badge / tag
 - In game tag / badge
 - Rank upgrades to everyone (who participated) for a month
- Added to tournament winner list (Hall of fame) Spookz idea

2nd place:
- Forum badge / tag
- In game tag / badge
- 10,000 credits each

3rd place:
- Forum badge / tag
- In game tag / badge
- 5,000 credits each 

Prizes should be given to players who participated for the team, not ones who are on the team.

replies.body:
1st: -Tournament Winner (lets use ToC as an example, it would be called 'ToC Winner') rank that has the same permissions and perks as a Diamond rank (for all players). This would last a month

2nd: Tournament 2nd Place (using ToC as an example again: it would be 'ToC 2nd Place') rank that has the same permissions and perks as an Emerald rank. This would also last for a month.

3rd: Tournament 3rd Place (using ToC as an example again: it would be 'ToC 3rd Place') rank that has the same permissions and perks as an Gold rank. This would also last for a month.

If this is too spammy in game, just a tag on the forums like previously, the same ranks given as i have previously put, and a badge of some sort (permanent would be nice :D (♈-winner badge?)
replies.body_tagged:
1st: -Tournament Winner (lets use ToC as an example, it would be called 'ToC Winner') rank that has the same permissions and perks as a Diamond rank (for all players). This would last a month

2nd: Tournament 2nd Place (using ToC as an example again: it would be 'ToC 2nd Place') rank that has the same permissions and perks as an Emerald rank. This would also last for a month.

3rd: Tournament 3rd Place (using ToC as an example again: it would be 'ToC 3rd Place') rank that has the same permissions and perks as an Gold rank. This would also last for a month.

If this is too spammy in game, just a tag on the forums like previously, the same ranks given as i have previously put, and a badge of some sort (permanent would be nice :D (♈-winner badge?)

replies.body:
1st Place: 
  • Champion Profile/Forum Tag
  • Ingame T3 Champion Badge ♈
  • TS Champion Rank
  • 100k Credits to all members
  • Leaders gets diamond rank, members emerald rank (if any leader or member already has a rank, then upgrade them, and give them the option whether to give the extra rank to another member or not)
  • Sign and head in hall of fame
2nd Place:
  • Runner Up Profile/Forum Tag
  • Ingame T3 Runner Up Badge ♈ (Silver)
  • TS Runner Up Rank
  • 50k Credits to all members
  • Emerald Rank for Leaders and Gold Rank for Members (if any leader or member already has a rank, upgrade them, and give them the option whether to give the extra rank to another member or not)
  • Sign and head in hall of fame
3rd Place:
  • 3rd Place Profile/Forum Tag
  • Ingame T3 3rd Place Badge ♈ (Bronze)
  • TS 3rd Place Rank
  • 25k Credits to all members
  • Gold Rank for Leaders (if any leader has a rank, upgrade them, and give them the option whether to give the extra rank to another member or not)
  • Sign and head in hall of fame
Semi-Finalist/4th Place:
  • 25k Credits to all members
  • Gold Rank to any member of the teams' choice
Quarter-Finalist:
  • 10k Credits to all members
MVP: (Winning team members choice)
  • T3 MVP Profile/Forum Tag
  • Ingame T3 MVP Tag ♈(Light Green)
  • Diamond/Emerald Rank (If he/she already has a rank, upgrade it, and give them the option whether to give it to another player or not)
  • Bonus 25k Credits
  • Sign in hall of fame as T3 MVP
Notes*
  • Prizes are only given members who participated in atleast 1 match in the playoffs (Quarter, Semi, or Finals)
  • Only the "actual" leaders can receive the leader prizes (wink Apollo wink xD)

  • 25k Credits to all members
  • Gold Rank for Leaders (if any leader has a rank, upgrade them, and give them the option whether to give the extra rank to another member or not)

Semi-Finalist/4th Place:
  • 25k Credits to all members

Quarter-Finalist:
  • 10k Credits to all members
MVP: (Winning team members choice)

  • Ingame T3 MVP Tag ♈(Light Green)

Notes*
  • Prizes are only given members who participated in atleast 1 match in the playoffs (Quarter, Semi, or Finals)
  • Only the "actual" leaders can receive the leader prizes (wink Apollo wink xD)
